title: Possible bug?
body:
It's been 3-2 Months with this bug I've been dealing with, I've been logging in, the client know's its my account but oddly it tells me.
"Your account does NOT have access to the Alpha  test."
I don't know if there is a hold up for you guys(Riot) to press "Yes" on there end or not. However I would love to participate in this
alpha client test. 

Thank you for you time! 

-Dracula

replies.body: I hope you get your invite though, if not, open beta isn't that far anymore ;D

1. Go to [Account Setting Page](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/na/en/protect) on League Website
2. Click **PRE-RELEASE TESTING**
3. Apply from there.

You need Riot-approved account to join alpha test.
